title: Elementary Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement Program for Improving Online Education Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers analyze the effectiveness of online education in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments and derive improvement strategies.

learning_goals: Design at least three interactive strategies to promote learner engagement in online math classes.
Propose at least two content creation guidelines applicable in limited technological environments.
Analyze online education satisfaction survey results to develop improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
